articles.author: Alex Byington
articles.title: 2025 NFL Draft: Mel Kiper shakes up Top 10 QB rankings following Scouting Combine - 5GOATs
articles.description: ESPN draft expert Mel Kiper Jr. overhauled his 2025 NFL Draft Top 10 list of quarterbacks following last week's NFL Combine in Indianapolis.
articles.content:
Coming out of the 2025 NFL Scouting Combine, ESPN NFL Draft guru Mel Kiper Jr. overhauled his Big Board rankings. And that included a big mover within his Top 10 quarterback list.
